abstract: CBS renewed its contract with Charles Osgood, who has been the anchor of the show since 1994. Mo Rocca, who has contributed to the program since 2006, will become a full-time correspondent.
snippet: CBS renewed its contract with Charles Osgood, who has been the anchor of the show since 1994. Mo Rocca, who has contributed to the program since 2006, will become a full-time correspondent.
lead_paragraph: CBS News said on Friday that it had renewed its contract with Charles Osgood, the long-time anchor of “CBS Sunday Morning,” and had promoted one of the show’s contributors, Mo Rocca.

headline.main: ‘CBS Sunday Morning’ Re-Signs Osgood and Promotes Rocca
